EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Americas_General_Military-Base-of-the-Future_Webinar.2.Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't forget! Register for tomorrow's Military Base of the Future webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Our Military Base of the Future webinar is tomorrow!
Join Senior Director Connected Defense and Cybersecurity, Norm Balchunas, for our Military Base of the Future Webinar.
Excellence in mission readiness can go beyond measuring personnel, equipment and supply status to an ultimate state of predictiveness, performance, and precision. Today, modern militaries seek technology superiority to out-innovate adversaries. Military bases and processes from the 1970s are ready for a refresh.
Enter the base of the future, which harnesses seamless connectivity across military operations to create a strategic edge that can make the difference between mission success and failure.
In this webinar, youâ€™ll learn: ${ctaLinkText} <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/02/register-for-military-base-future-webinar?utm_source=webinar&utm_medium=event&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_def&utm_content=email-invitation"]]>
